sentences.en: All those people in the middle are dispensable.
sentences.cn: 所有那些立场骑墙的人都可要可不要。

sentences.en: Consider the design conflict of an ordinary dispensable razor.
sentences.cn: 剃须刀必须很锋利以便能方便的剃须.

sentences.en: Delete what is dispensable and give more prominence to the essentials.
sentences.cn: 可以不说的去掉,该说的就可以更突出.

sentences.en: Flexible rectangular waveguide is a dispensable component for the connection between microwave equipment and feeder.
sentences.cn: 矩形软波导是微波设备和馈线之间连接必不可少的一种器件.

sentences.en: He repents having compensated the dispensable pension for fear of penalty.
sentences.cn: 他后悔因害怕处罚而补偿了不必要的养老金.

sentences.en: If you want to run the enterprise well, none of these two qualifications is dispensable.
sentences.cn: 如果想把企业经营好, 这两个条件缺一不可.

sentences.en: Most candidates are photography fans with dispensable income.
sentences.cn: 广泛的参与人群普遍是摄影爱好者、发烧友,消费能力强.

sentences.en: Neither of these two approaches is dispensable.
sentences.cn: 照顾全局,从实际出发,这两个观点缺一不可.
兼职工作人员被认为是可有可无的。

sentences.en: Person, it is affection animal, dispensable?
sentences.cn: 人, 是情感动物, 可有可无?

sentences.en: Since none of the four is dispensable, they are equally important.
sentences.cn: 实际上,这四种力量既然是缺一不可的, 所以是同等重要的.

sentences.en: They looked on music and art lessons as dispensable.
sentences.cn: 他们认为音乐课和美术课是可有可无的。

sentences.en: Thought the instant noodles worked as staple food the age the staple food are also dispensable.
sentences.cn: 想,速食面当主食的年代,主食也就可有可无了.

sentences.en: Wherever conductors are needed, insulators will be in dispensable.
sentences.cn: 凡是需要导体的地方, 绝缘体就必不可少.

words.tran_cn: 可分配；可特别恕免；可宽恕

trans.tran_cn: 非必需的，可省去的，不必要
trans.tran_en: not necessary or important and so easy to get rid of
